def perms(arr, idx):
    if idx == len(arr):
        print arr
    for i in xrange(idx, len(arr)):
        arr[idx], arr[i] = arr[i], arr[idx]
        perms(arr, idx + 1)
        arr[idx], arr[i] = arr[i], arr[idx]


def main():
    arr = range(1, 4)
    perms(arr,0)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
